articles.description: Walmart currently has our favorite over-ear headphones, Sony’s WH-1000XM5, on sale for over $77 off.
articles.content: Sony is at the top of its game regarding quality wireless headphones with noise-canceling technology. The Sony WH-1000XM5 is a powerful set of cans in its own right, and they only get better when you… [+1087 chars]
